title: Cobras & Lagartos
resume:
Cobras & Lagartos is a Brazilian telenovela that was produced and aired by TV Globo from April 24 and November 18, 2006, totaling 179 chapters.
Featured Mariana Ximenes, Daniel de Oliveira, Lázaro Ramos, Henri Castelli, Taís Araújo and Carolina Dieckmann in the lead roles.
The plot was nominated in 2007 for best actor Emmy for his performance of Lázaro Ramos.
